revised_title: On the Geometry of Curves and Their Contact
tldr: The author investigates the contact between curves in a mathematical context, focusing on the degree of contact and the equations that determine the constants of a curve. The study involves the use of symbols like O and D to differentiate and eliminate variables, leading to the development of a conic of 5-pointic contact. The results are compared with those of Mr. Cayley, demonstrating the identity of the expressions derived by both methods.
